allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1 Foundation: Core infrastructure, config, models, CLI skeleton

Implemented:
- Exception hierarchy \(src/rasen/exceptions.py\)
- Logging setup \(src/rasen/logging.py\)
- Configuration system with Pydantic models \(src/rasen/config.py\)
- Domain models \(src/rasen/models.py\) - TerminationReason, SessionStatus, Subtask, etc.
- CLI skeleton with Click \(src/rasen/cli.py\) - init, run, status, logs, stop, resume, merge
- Example config file \(rasen.yml.example\)
- py.typed marker for type checking
- Updated pyproject.toml to exclude Auto-Claude, ralph-orchestrator, _bmad from linting

Quality gates:
- ✅ uv run ruff check . passes
- ✅ uv run ruff format --check . passes
- ✅ uv run mypy src/ passes
- ✅ uv run rasen --help works
- ✅ uv run rasen --version shows 0.1.0

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 2: Claude Code CLI Integration - subprocess wrapper and event parsing

Implemented:
- Claude Code CLI wrapper \(src/rasen/claude_runner.py\)
  - run_claude_session\(\) subprocess wrapper with timeout support
  - Agent configs for initializer, coder, reviewer, QA
  - Reviewer and QA marked as read-only
- Prompt template renderer \(src/rasen/prompts.py\)
  - render_prompt\(\) with {variable} substitution
  - create_agent_prompt\(\) for agent-specific prompts
- Event parser \(src/rasen/events.py\)
  - parse_events\(\) extracts <event topic="...">...</event> tags
  - has_completion_event\(\), has_blocked_event\(\) helpers
  - get_event_payload\(\) utility

Quality gates:
- ✅ uv run ruff check . passes
- ✅ uv run mypy src/ passes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
